title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4624.2 - Cash control report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4624.2 - Cash control report

State Regulations

Every licensee shall attach and file with its financial
statement an additional statement (form GC-7B, as prescribed by the commission)
setting forth receipts relating to each type of game of chance and the names of
the workers. The records setting forth the calculation of the receipts shall be
retained by the licensee for such licensee's permanent records, together with
form GC-7B, for a period of not less than four years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4624.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
